price: Kandi igicucu (cy’ibiti byo mu ijuru) kizaba kibegereye, ndetse n’imbuto zabyo zizabegerezwa.
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
